sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_0586_til_post"> <x_0586_til_post action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <category display_value="Tricks">a8c6c0be1b8154908ed631d7dc4bcbef</category> <github_id>109</github_id> <github_url>https://github.com/iamkalai/SNTIL/issues/109</github_url> <message>Want to know your ServiceNow release and build information via script? There is an undocumented class for this as well. ```javascript gs.info(new sn_appclient.GlideUpgradeUtil().getCurrentBuildName()); //Get release name gs.info(new sn_appclient.GlideUpgradeUtil().getCurrentBuild()); //Get the build name (patch) and build date ```</message> <number>TIL0001113</number> <status>old</status> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-28 07:27:14</sys_created_on> <sys_id>c5eb40cf2f8b811051dad5f62799b6f9</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-03 07:11:44</sys_updated_on> <title>Get ServiceNow release and build details</title> </x_0586_til_post> </record_update>
